Title: The Three Gs
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Craig Gore, Tim Walsh
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: A case involving one of Chicago's most wanted fugitives hits close to home with Olinsky; an altercation with another officer lands Sean Roman in hot water; Platt helps Nadia prepare for her polygraph test.
